name: Validation of headers

children.description: Given the user is calling the Assignment Trigger API
When the user performs a get request to the Assessment Trigger API
And the user is triggering Assessment "USER_SCORE_CALCULATION"
Then the request returns success triggered by Assessment "USER_SCORE_CALCULATION"
And header validation is performed based on Assessment "USER_SCORE_CALCULATION"

And the user is triggering Assessment "USER_SCORE_MIGRATION"
Then the request returns success triggered by Assessment "USER_SCORE_MIGRATION"
And header validation is performed based on Assessment "USER_SCORE_MIGRATION"
Given the user is calling the Assignment Trigger API

And the user is triggering Assessment "INSTANCE_RANK_CALCULATION"
Then the request returns success triggered by Assessment "INSTANCE_RANK_CALCULATION"
And header validation is performed based on Assessment "INSTANCE_RANK_CALCULATION"
Given the user is calling the Assignment Trigger API
When the user performs a get request to the Assessment Trigger API
And the user is triggering Assessment "INSTANCE_RANK_MIGRATION"
Then the request returns success triggered by Assessment "INSTANCE_RANK_MIGRATION"
And header validation is performed based on Assessment "INSTANCE_RANK_MIGRATION"
Given the user is calling the Assignment Trigger API
When the user performs a get request to the Assessment Trigger API
And the user is triggering Assessment "INSTANCE_COMPLETE_NOTIFICATION"
Then the request returns success triggered by Assessment "INSTANCE_COMPLETE_NOTIFICATION"
And header validation is performed based on Assessment "INSTANCE_COMPLETE_NOTIFICATION"

title: Validation of headers

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is calling the Assignment Trigger API
When the user performs a get request to the Assessment Trigger API
And the user is triggering Assessment "<Event>"
Then the request returns success triggered by Assessment "<Event>"
And header validation is performed based on Assessment "<Event>"
